message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that I believe would greatly enhance your endeavors and contribute significantly to your success. After careful consideration and evaluation, I propose to offer this exceptional item to you at a special price of $1,300,000. This is a unique chance to secure a high-quality asset at a price that reflects its true value while also offering you considerable savings compared to market rates. I trust that you will find this proposal compelling and look forward to discussing the details further with you. Please let me know if you have any questions or require additional information.
